constraint_dialog_title.description: Title text for dialog alerting users about locked steps or activities (unable to visit because of navigation constraints)

constraint_allItems.description: Text to add after activity name when a constraint requires user to satisfy a requirement for all items in an activity

constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.value: 您必須完成目前的 {0} 才能繼續進行。
constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current step before moving on

constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: 您必須完成目前 {0} 的所有步驟才能繼續進行。
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before moving on

constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.value: 您必須完成目前的 {0} 才能離開。
constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current step before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: 您必須完成目前 {0} 的所有步驟才能離開。
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.value: 您必須先完成以下才能觀看這個項目:
constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.value: 您必須先觀看以下步驟才能觀看這個項目:
constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.description: The message shown to students telling them to visit items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.value: 您必須先取消以下限制才能觀看此項目:
constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.description: The message shown to students telling them to unlock (make visitable) previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.value: 您必須先將以下 '{0}' 設為 '{1}' 才能觀看這個項目:
constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.description: The message shown to students telling them that the steps shown below must have 'statusType' set to 'statusValue' before they can work on the selected step

constraint_message_mustCreateXIdeaBasket.value: 您必須至少新增 {0} {1} 到 '{2} {3}' 才能繼續進行，您尚未新增任何的 {4} 到 {5} 中。
constraint_message_mustCreateXIdeaBasket.description: The message shown to students telling them they need to create one idea on the step before they can proceed. They have not created any ideas on the step.

constraint_message_mustCreateXIdeaBasket.value: 您必須至少新增 {0} {1} 到 '{2} {3}' 才能繼續進行，您只新增了 {4} {5} 到 {6} 中。
constraint_message_mustCreateXIdeaBasket.description: The message shown to students telling them they need to create multiple ideas on the step before they can proceed. They have not created enough ideas on the step.

session_timeout_warning.value: 您已經閒置一段時間，若您不立即更新登入狀態, 您將登出 WISE。
session_timeout_warning.description: Warning text to display to users in the session timeout alert.

session_timeout_confirm.description: Text to display on button in the session timeout alert that users can press to renew session.

session_timeout_message.value: 您已經閒置一段時間並且登出 WISE，請重新登入以繼續。
session_timeout_message.description: Text to display to display to users when there session timed out and they have been logged out of WISE.

session_timeout_title.description: Title text for the session timeout alert.

classroomMonitor_run.description: Text displaying the ID of the current run in the classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced by ID number)

classroomMonitor_save.description: Text for save button in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_viewProject.description: Text for link to preview project in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_workgroupsOnline.description: Text displaying number of workgroups currently online ({0} will be replaced with actual number)

classroomMonitor_monitor.description: Text for student progress link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_gradebook_title.description: Title text for grade book link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_manage.description: Text for manage students link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_manage_title.description: Title text for manage students link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_idea_baskets.description: Text for idea baskets link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_announcements.description: Text for announcements link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_notes.description: Text for run notes link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_exportWork.description: Text for export work link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_runSettings.description: Text for run settings link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_showClassroom.description: Text for show classroom link in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_allPeriods.description: Text for select all periods option in a period select dropdown in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_periodLabel.description: Text for period options ({0} will be replaced by period name) in a select dropdown in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_pause.description: Text for pause screens tool button in classroom monitor (will be preceded by 'pause' icon)

classroomMonitor_pause_on.description: Text for pause screens tool button (when pause is on) in classroom monitor (will be preceded by 'pause' icon)

classroomMonitor_pause_off.description: Text for pause screens tool button (when pause is off) in classroom monitor (will be preceded by 'pause' icon)

classroomMonitor_pause_title.description: Title text for pause screens tool button in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_pause_selectPeriods.description: Label text for pause screens select period control in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_pause_message_label.description: Label text for pause screens message to show students input field in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_pause_message_default.value: 您的教師已經暫停您的畫面。
classroomMonitor_pause_message_default.description: Default message to show students when teacher pauses their screens using the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_pause_noneSelected.description: Text to show when no periods are selected in the pause screens tool the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_pause_periods.description: Plural for the word 'periods' (will be preceded by number of select periods in the pause screens tool in the classroom monitor)

classroomMonitor_studentProgress_totalCo.description: Label text for the total student completion display in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_studentProgress_workgro.description: Text indicating that workgroup is online in the classroom monitor (only shown to screen readers)
Text indicating that workgroup is offline in the classroom monitor (only shown to screen readers)

classroomMonitor_studentProgress_viewStu.description: Title text to show on links to view student work in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_studentProgress_headers.description: Header text for the table column showing whether workgroup is online in the student progress table of classroom monitor
Header text for the period table column in the student progress table of classroom monitor
Header text for the workgroup column in the student progress table of classroom monitor
Header text for the column showing current step a workgroup is on in the student progress table of classroom monitor
Header text for the column showing time spent on the current step in the student progress table of classroom monitor
Header text for the project completion column in the student progress table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_headers_no.description: Header text for the step title column in the step progress table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_headers_st.description: Header text for the column showing current number of students in the step progress table of classroom monitor
Header text for the step completion column in the step progress table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_headers_ma.description: Header text for the max score column in the step progress table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_totalCompl.description: Label text for the total step completion display in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.value:
尚無步驟完成度資訊，可能是因為:

  1. 您的學生尚未開始執行專題; 或
  2. 這只是WISE啟動步驟監控前開始的舊課程。
classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.description: Tooltip text to show when step completion percentage is not available for a step that can't be graded in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.value:
尚無步驟完成度資訊，可能是因為:

  1. 您的學生尚未開始執行專題; 或
  2. 這只是WISE啟動步驟監控前開始的舊課程，
您仍可透過選取步驟名稱觀看學生作業。
classroomMonitor_stepProgress_completion.description: Tooltip text to show when step completion percentage is not available for a step that can be graded in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_stepProgress_viewStepWo.description: Title text to show on links to view step work in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_tableInfoText.description: Text for the information display at the bottom of classroom monitor tables ({0} will be replaced with number of items currently being shown)

classroomMonitor_grading_search.description: Placeholder text for the search input in grade by step and grade by student tables of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_noResponse.value: 小組尚未提交此步驟之作業。
classroomMonitor_grading_noResponse.description: Text to display when workgroup has not submitted any work for a step in the grading view of the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_latestWork.description: Header text for student work that is the most recent revision in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_workRevision.description: Header text for student work that is not that most recent revision in the classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced with revision number)

classroomMonitor_grading_flag.description: Label for flag checkboxes in grading views of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_teacherComment.description: Label for teacher comment inputs in grading views of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_teacherScore.description: Label for teacher score inputs in grading views of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_addPremadeComme.description: Text for link to add premade comments to teacher feedback inputs in grading views of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_revisionsCount.description: Text for the number of revisions in the grade by student and grade by step tables of classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced with number of student work submissions for a step)

classroomMonitor_grading_revisionDate.description: Text for student work timestamp displays in grading views of classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced by date/time)

classroomMonitor_grading_lastAnnotation.description: Text for the latest teacher feedback (grade or comment) timestamp display in grading views of classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced by date/time)

classroomMonitor_grading_lastAnnotation_.description: Text for when there is no feedback (grade or comment) in grading views of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_flagOnly.description: Text for option to only display flagged items in grading views of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_itemsToReview.description: Text for display showing number of new student work items to review in grading views of classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced with number of new items)

classroomMonitor_grading_options_select.description: Text for grading display options dropdown when no options are selected in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_options_label.description: Label text for grading display options dropdown in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_grading_invalidScore.value: {0} 為無效的分數，請再試一次。
classroomMonitor_grading_invalidScore.description: Text to display when user tries to enter an invalid score in grading views of the  classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced with the user's input)

classroomMonitor_gradeByStudent_title.description: Title text for grade by student section in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_gradeByStudent_headers_.description: Header text for the student work column in the grade by student table of classroom monitor
Header text for the score column in the grade by student table of classroom monitor
Header text for the teacher feedback column in the grade by student table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_gradeByStep_title.description: Title text for grade by step section in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_gradeByStep_headers_stu.description: Header text for the student work column in the grade by step table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_gradeByStep_headers_sco.description: Header text for the score column in the grade by step table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_gradeByStep_headers_fee.description: Header text for the teacher feedback column in the grade by step table of classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_hidePersonalInfo.description: Text for option to hide personal info in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_newItemsOnly.description: Text for option to only show new work in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_saveConfirmation.description: Notification to display when teacher changes (scores, feedback, etc.) have been saved in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_saving.description: Notification to display when saving changes (scores, feedback, etc.) in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_studentProgress_headers.description: Header text for the total score column in the student progress table of classroom monitor
